creator: egli@apache.org
text:
If you click the "Scheduler Admin" link in the publish screen of the blog pub
you get an exception

creator: egli@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 9202
stack trace of the exception

creator: egli@apache.org
text: Do a fallback screen which doesn't show the scheduler stuff

creator: egli@apache.org
text:
The publishing process now uses the fallback module and the blog pub overrides
the default publishing screen and does not display the scheduling stuff.
